metadata.author: Geronimo Stilton
metadata.description: It was a dream come true - I was off to Egypt to interview a famous archaeologist! I climbed onboard a crabby old camel that would take me across the desert to the Cheese Pyramid.

translation.web_share_player_sharing_paused_desc: We’ve frozen this link because it may be breaking our <1>sharing policy</1>. The playlist’s creator can email hello@yotoplay.com to request a manual review.

translation.web_share_player_not_found_heading: Aïe, aïe, aïe… Ça, on ne l’avait pas prévu !
